SceneDescription.name: Introduction
SceneDescription.description:
Lord Borkus clears his throat.
Lord Borkus: "I called you all here because we have some very important guests coming today. They will be arriving this evening. I’ve noticed that you’ve all been slacking off."
Lord Borkus: "This meeting is too important for fuck-ups. My mansion needs to be spotless and perfect before they arrive. If it isn’t..."
